mapper.select: select max(e.gid)gid,max(e.rwly)rwly, (case when max(e.rwly)=0 then '公司工作' when max(e.rwly)=1 then '部门工作' else '个人工作' end)gzlb ,(case when max(e.rwlx)=0 then '重点工作' else '日常工作' end)gzlx ,(case when max(e.czzt)=0 then '填单' when max(e.czzt)=1 then '待审核' else '审核通过' end)czzt ,max(e.gznr)gznr,to_char(max(e.jssj),'yyyy-mm-dd')jssj ,max(e.gzbz)gzbz,max(e.rwlx)rwlx,max(e.czzt)zt,to_char(wm_concat(e.yhdm))yhdm, max(e.shr)shr,to_char(max(e.kssj),'yyyy-mm-dd')kssj,to_char(wm_concat(e.yhmc))zrzt from( select a.gid,a.rwly,a.gznr,a.jssj,a.gzbz,a.rwlx,a.czzt,a.cjr, a.shr,a.kssj,c.yhdm, (select xsmc from rwdb_xtyhxx x where c.yhdm=x.yhdm)yhmc from rwdb_rwbxjsh a left join (select b.rwid,b.yhdm from rwdb_taskzrzt b )c on c.rwid=a.gid where a.cjr=#{yhdm} )e group by gid
select a.yhdm,a.xsmc from Rwdb_Xtyhxx a,rwdb_xtpost b,rwdb_postop c where a.yhdm=c.yhdm and b.postid = c.postid and b.postname=#{jsmc}
select b.postname,b.postid from Rwdb_Xtyhxx a,rwdb_xtpost b,rwdb_postop c where a.yhdm=c.yhdm and b.postid = c.postid and a.yhdm=#{yhdm}

select a.yhdm,a.yhmc,a.xsmc ,e.scompname dybm from Rwdb_Xtyhxx a,rwdb_xtpost b,rwdb_postop c ,rwdb_unitdept d,rwdb_organization e where a.yhdm=c.yhdm and b.postid = c.postid and d.yhdm=a.yhdm and d.dept=e.compid and b.postname=#{jsmc}
mapper.insert: insert into RWDB_RWBXJSH(gid, rwly, gznr, jssj, gzbz, rwlx, czzt, cjr, cjsj, kssj) values (#{gid}, #{gzlb},#{gznr}, TO_DATE(#{jssj},'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{gzbz}, #{gzlx},0, #{cjr}, sysdate, TO_DATE(#{kssj},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
insert into RWDB_TASKZRZT(gid, rwid, yhdm, cjsj) values (#{gid}, #{rwid},#{zrzt}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update RWDB_RWBXJSH set rwly=#{gzlb}, gznr=#{gznr}, gzbz=#{gzbz} , rwlx=#{gzlx}, kssj=TO_DATE(#{kssj},'YYYY-MM-DD'), jssj=TO_DATE(#{jssj},'YYYY-MM-DD') where gid=#{gid}
update RWDB_RWBXJSH set CZZT=#{czzt},SHR=#{yhdm} where gid=#{gid}
